name: Volatile Substance
description: Volatile Substance is a precursor resource used in making explosive Ammunition and weapons like the Frag Grenade . Volatile Substance is highly unstable and has a spoil timer of 600 seconds. Once spoiled, the item will then become Inert Volatile Substance .
